headline: Globe Life (GL) Tops Q4 Earnings Estimates
summary: Globe Life (GL) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 1.29% and 1.04%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Globe Life (GL) Tops Q4 Earnings Estimates
raw.summary: Globe Life (GL) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 1.29% and 1.04%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Globe Life: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The average estimate of seven analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $3.10 per share. The life and health insurance company posted revenue of $1.47 billion in the period. Its adjusted revenue was $1.46 billion, missing Street forecasts.

raw.headline: Globe Life: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: The average estimate of seven analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $3.10 per share. The life and health insurance company posted revenue of $1.47 billion in the period. Its adjusted revenue was $1.46 billion, missing Street forecasts.

headline: GLOBE LIFE INC. REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER 2024 RESULTS
summary: Globe Life Inc. (NYSE: GL) reported today that for the quarter ended December 31, 2024, net income was $3.01 per diluted common share, compared with $2.88 per diluted common share for the year-ago quarter. Net operating income for the quarter was $3.14 per diluted common share, compared with $2.80 per diluted common share for the year-ago quarter.

headline: Globe Life's profit climbs on higher investment returns, stronger underwriting
summary: Life and supplemental health insurancefirm Globe Life reported an increase in fourth-quarterprofit on Wednesday, driven by stronger underwriting performanceand higher income from investments. ...
